trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource consumed by the member of a class.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os recursos consumidos pelo membro de uma classe.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: If the ResourceConsumptionAttribute attribute is applied to a member, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute must also be applied.
trans-unit.target: Se o atributo ResourceConsumptionAttribute é aplicado a um membro, o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>atributo também deve ser aplicado.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the resource scope of the consumed resource is different than the resource scope of how it is consumed, the constructor that takes a `consumptionScope` parameter should be used to specify how the resource is consumed.
trans-unit.target: Se o escopo do recurso do recurso consumido for diferente do que o recurso de como ele é consumido, o construtor que usa um `consumptionScope` parâmetro deve ser usado para especificar como os recursos são consumidos.

trans-unit.source: For example, a resource may be exposed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource, but only used at the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um recurso pode ser exposto como um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>recursos, mas só é usado no <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>e <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>escopo.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: For this example the `consumptionScope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.
trans-unit.target: Para este exemplo de `consumptionScope` parâmetro está definido como <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>| <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The `resourceScope` parameter in the constructor must specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> greater than or equal to the resource exposure of all called members.
trans-unit.target: O `resourceScope` parâmetro no construtor deve especificar um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>maior que ou igual a exposição de recursos de todos os membros de chamada.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: For example, a method consuming two <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources and one <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource would be identified as consuming a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> and a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource by setting `resourceScope` to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um método consumindo dois recursos <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>e um recurso de <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>seria identificado como consumir um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>e um recurso de <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>definindo `resourceScope` para <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>| <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: `Public` members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources.
trans-unit.target: `Public`membros não podem expor <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ou <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>recursos.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>membros não podem expor <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>recursos.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The graph of methods terminates when a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute with a resource scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> is applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: O gráfico de métodos termina quando um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>atributo com um escopo de recursos de <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>é aplicado a um método.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"> </xref> classe especifica o escopo do recurso consumido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> para os recursos consumidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource and the scope of how it is consumed.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"> </xref> classe especifica o escopo do recurso consumido e o escopo de como ele é consumido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute specifies a scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute must specify a resource it consumes and how it consumes it, by specifying a value for the `consumptionScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>atributo especifica um escopo de <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>, em seguida, o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute>atributo deve especificar um recurso consome e como ele consome, especificando um valor para o `consumptionScope` parâmetro.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The scope specified by `consumptionScope` should be less than or equal to the scope specified by `resourceScope`.
trans-unit.target: O escopo especificado por `consumptionScope` deve ser menor ou igual ao escopo especificado pelo `resourceScope`.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope can be consumed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope, but not as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>escopo pode ser consumido como um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ou <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>escopo, mas não como um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>escopo.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> para os recursos consumidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> used by this member.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> usado por este membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the consumption scope for this member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo de consumo para esse membro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> object specifying the resource scope used by this member.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> objeto que especifica o escopo do recurso usado por este membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource scope for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo do recurso para o recurso consumido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> object specifying the resource scope of the consumed member.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> objeto que especifica o escopo do recurso do membro consumido.
